title: Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop M2 Pro chip with 12‑core CPU and 19‑core GPU: 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR Display, 16GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage. Works with iPhone/iPad; Space Gray
descriptions:
### Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop - Space Gray

#### Overview
Experience unparalleled performance and efficiency with the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop. This cutting-edge device is powered by the advanced M2 Pro or M2 Max chip, offering you a choice of configurations to suit your needs. With a stunning 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, a robust 22-hour battery life, and a sleek all-aluminum unibody enclosure, the 2023 MacBook Pro is designed to elevate your productivity and creativity.

#### Key Features
- **Powerful Performance:**
  - **M2 Pro Chip:** 12-core CPU, 19-core GPU, up to 32GB unified memory
  - **M2 Max Chip:** 12-core CPU, up to 38-core GPU, up to 96GB unified memory

- **Stunning Display:**
  - 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display
  - Extreme Dynamic Range
  - Over 1000 nits brightness
  - HDR content support
  - Pro reference modes

- **Exceptional Battery Life:**
  - Up to 22 hours of battery life

- **Advanced Camera and Audio:**
  - 1080p FaceTime HD camera
  - Three-mic array for clear audio capture
  - Six-speaker sound system with Spatial Audio

- **Comprehensive Connectivity:**
  - MagSafe charging
  - 3 Thunderbolt 4 ports
  - SDXC card slot
  - HDMI port
  - Headphone jack
  - Wi-Fi 6E
  - Bluetooth 5.3

- **Magic Keyboard:**
  - Full-height function key row
  - Touch ID for secure authentication

- **Cross-Device Integration:**
  - Universal Clipboard
  - FaceTime calls
  - Messages
  - Seamless integration with iPhone and iPad

- **Durable Build:**
  - All-aluminum unibody enclosure
  - Space Gray color

- **Software and Storage:**
  - 16GB unified memory
  - 512GB SSD storage
  - Free software updates for years

- **Software Compatibility:**
  - Adobe Creative Cloud
  - Xcode
  - Affinity Designer
  - Microsoft 365
  - iPhone and iPad apps

#### Specifications
- **Processor:**
  - **M2 Pro:** 12-core CPU, 19-core GPU, up to 32GB unified memory
  - **M2 Max:** 12-core CPU, up to 38-core GPU, up to 96GB unified memory
- **Display:**
  - 16.2 inches
  - Liquid Retina XDR
  - Extreme Dynamic Range
  - Over 1000 nits brightness
  - HDR content
  - Pro reference modes
- **Battery:**
  - Up to 22 hours
- **Camera and Audio:**
  - 1080p FaceTime HD camera
  - Three-mic array
  - Six-speaker sound system with Spatial Audio
- **Ports:**
  - MagSafe charging
  - 3 Thunderbolt 4 ports
  - SDXC card slot
  - HDMI port
  - Headphone jack
- **Wireless Connectivity:**
  - Wi-Fi 6E
  - Bluetooth 5.3
- **Keyboard:**
  - Magic Keyboard
  - Full-height function key row
  - Touch ID
- **Interoperability:**
  - Universal Clipboard
  - FaceTime calls
  - Messages
  - Seamless integration with iPhone and iPad
- **Build:**
  - All-aluminum unibody enclosure
  - Space Gray color
- **Memory and Storage:**
  - 16GB unified memory
  - 512GB SSD storage
- **Software:**
  - Free software updates for years

#### Why Choose the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro?
The 2023 MacBook Pro is the ultimate tool for professionals and creators who demand the best. Its powerful M2 Pro or M2 Max chip ensures that you can handle demanding tasks with ease, while the stunning Liquid Retina XDR display brings your work to life with incredible detail and color accuracy. The long battery life and advanced connectivity options make it perfect for on-the-go use, and the sleek, durable design ensures it looks and feels as good as it performs.

Upgrade to the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro and experience the future of computing today!
